review_blob: A cloudy lighter orange appearance.  First think you notice it the very distinct delicious aroma.  Almost a sour grapefruit.  Smells so good. Good Hops.  Leaves a bitter after taste on back of tongue, but it isnt that bitter when drinking.  Has a little bit of that fruity taste that is in the smell, but its faint.  Very VERY good.  Smooth.
